document_data.caption: A map showing Bitter Alley in the Dock Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Bitter Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Bitter Alley''' was a small alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Bitter Alley branched south off of [[Fish Street (Waterdeep)|Fish Street]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]], connecting with [[Snail Street]] to the east and [[Presper Street]] to the south. [[Two Flask Alley]] branched off of the western side of Bitter Alley.
